title: Profit of leading mutual property/casualty insurance companies 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Profit in million U.S. dollars for 8 number of Insurance Companiess.
The maximum Profit in million U.S. dollars 8788.4 is found at Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. and the minimum is found at Farmers Insurance Exchange where Insurance Companies is 70.5.
Insurance Companies Farmers Insurance Exchange has 124.66 times less Profit in million U.S. dollars than Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. which is the highest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Insurance Companies in the x axis and Profit in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. has the highest Profit in million U.S. dollars and Farmers Insurance Exchange has the lowest Profit in million U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Profit in million U.S. dollars for 8 number of Insurance Companiess.
The maximum Profit in million U.S. dollars 8788.4 is found at Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. and the minimum is found at Farmers Insurance Exchange where Insurance Companies is 70.5.
Insurance Companies Farmers Insurance Exchange has 124.66 times less Profit in million U.S. dollars than Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. which is the highest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Profit in million U.S. dollars for 8 number of Insurance Companiess.
The maximum Profit in million U.S. dollars 8788.4 is found at Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. and the minimum is found at Farmers Insurance Exchange where Insurance Companies is 70.5.
The second highest Profit in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Insurance Companies Auto-Owners Insurance.
The difference of Profit in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Insurance Companies is 8717.9.

Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. is higher than any other Insurance Companiess with value 8788.4, followed by Auto-Owners Insurance, and Erie Insurance Group. Down to Insurance Companies Farmers Insurance Exchange with the lowest value 70.5.
The lowest value 70.5 at Farmers Insurance Exchange is almost 6.15 times smaller than the average value 1428.15.
